active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, debate the advantages and limitations of real-time monitoring dashboards versus periodic reports in detecting insider threats to cloud assets. Reference NIST SP 800-137 and provide examples of KPIs that would be most critical in such scenarios.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.

flashcard_generation.system_prompt: You are an expert flashcard generator for cybersecurity education. Topic: Real-Time Monitoring Dashboards (Hierarchy: Cybersecurity > Asset Security > Data Security Controls > Data Monitoring and Auditing > Data Activity Monitoring > Real-Time Monitoring Dashboards). Use the provided research context (complete with NIST SP 800-137: ISCM; 800-137A: Assessment; 800-53: Controls; tools like Splunk/ELK; KPIs/best practices), learning objectives, active learning activities, scaffolding layers (incl. prior knowledge & concept map), and flashcard schema to generate 50 high-quality flashcards. Sources: NIST SP 800-137 (https://nvlpubs.nist.gov/nistpubs/Legacy/SP/nistspecialpublication800-137.pdf); SP 800-137A (https://doi.org/10.6028/NIST.SP.800-137A); SP 800-53 Rev 5 (https://doi.org/10.6028/NIST.SP.800-53r5); CIS Controls v8; Splunk Docs (splunk.com). Incorporate pedagogy: Map to Bloom's levels/objectives; scaffold from Layer 1-4; reference active learning. Follow schema exactly: Front/Back structure, distractors per protocol, explanations with context. Balance types. Output as JSON array of objects: [{'front': '...', 'back': {'answer': '...', 'explanation': '...', 'blooms_level': '...', 'references': '...', 'scaffolding_layer': '...', 'active_learning_link': '...'}}, ...]. Ensure voter consensus (84.3%): Full NIST coverage, tools, misconceptions for distractors.
